sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Update the first run date of indicator template with min first run date of the associated indicator. Also update the next run date for the indicator template which has collection frequency as quarterly or semi annually.</description> <name>Set Indicator template first run date </name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[//Execute a scheduled script job var rec = new GlideRecord('sysauto_script'); rec.get('name', 'update_indicator_and_template');
gs.executeNow(rec);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-08-31 09:48:43</sys_created_on> <sys_id>47b2c15cc74310107e299e0703c2605c</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>20</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Set Indicator template first run date </sys_name> <sys_package display_value="">53f81621cb200200829cf865734c9c58</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="">53f81621cb200200829cf865734c9c58</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_47b2c15cc74310107e299e0703c2605c</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-10-14 05:00:36</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Set Indicator template first run date
